Overview For gstConstraintEffect Members Chapter

gstConstraintEffect

gstConstraintEffect( ) ;

Constructor.

~gstConstraintEffect

~gstConstraintEffect( ) ;

Destructor.

calcEffectForce

virtual gstVector calcEffectForce( void* phantom , gstVector& torques ) ;

calcEffectForce

virtual gstVector calcEffectForce( void* phantom ) ;

For extension: Caculate the force. Force is returned in parent reference frame of phantom. When subclassing, the first parameter should be cast to gstPHANToM to retrieve any information about the state of the PHANToM that is needed to calculate the forces. DeltaT should be used to update the time. Also, if the effect is not active, the zero vector should be returned. ACTUNG! WARNING!: Never call PHANToM->setForce or PHANToM->setForce_WC from this function. It will cause an infinite recursion.

getDamping

double getDamping( ) const;

Get damping coefficient.

getSpringStiffness

double getSpringStiffness( ) const;

Get spring constant (stiffness) [Kg/(1000.0*sec^2)].

void setLine( gstPoint newPointOnLine , gstVector newLineDir ) ;
